snippet.title: The Quizard's Domain - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist "The Quizard's Domain" on Steam today, and hang out with us on Discord to provide feedback and suggestions, as well as joining future closed testing!

Website: calmpewter.games/
Steam: store.steampowered.com/app/2802490/The_Quizards_Domain/
Discord: discord.gg/YGDpGwEk

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What's this all about?
Knowing is only half the battle! Pub quiz meets pub brawl in this fast-paced hero-based BATTLE QUIZ! Knock out friends and foes as you smash your way to the correct answers, in a wide variety of arenas and game modes. Trivia night just got way more intense!
